name: TripleZip
headline: Automating CRE accounting with AI
description: TripleZip is a platform that automates accounting for commercial real estate using AI. CRE firms use TripleZip to save up to 95% on accounting compared to hiring an outside firm for complex tasks like CAM reconciliation and budgeting.

founders.name: Grayson Pike, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder of TripleZip, a platform for automating commercial real estate accounting.

Before TripleZip, I was a consultant at McKinsey & Company and a back-end tech lead at the hedge fund ExodusPoint.

University of Texas at Austin class of '21 ü§ò

founders.name: Yash Sahota, Founder
founders.description:
Co-founder of TripleZip, a platform for automating commercial real estate accounting.

Before TripleZip, I was a product security engineer at Slack and a consultant at McKinsey & Company.

Cornell CS '20

raw_markdown="TripleZip - AI Property Accounting for Commercial Real Estate
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/679f1fa714fa7564d296c1ff/67a01e7adade60903667d758_triplezip_logo_with_name_green_and_black_bold.png)](https://www.triplezip.ai/</>)
  * [Features](https://www.triplezip.ai/</>)
  * [contact](https://www.triplezip.ai/</contact>)


[Log in](https://www.triplezip.ai/<http:/app.triplezip.ai>)[Contact Us](https://www.triplezip.ai/</contact>)
# Modern solutions for commercial real estate 
This is some text inside of a div block.
TripleZip accelerates your property accounting. Our intuitive platform helps you budget, reconcile, and forecast up to 10X faster.
[Contact us](https://www.triplezip.ai/</contact>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/679f1fa714fa7564d296c1ff/67a1013ee3484468e95528b6_Hero_1.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/679f1fa714fa7564d296c1ff/679f1fa714fa7564d296c9ae_dot.svg)
## Property accounting reimagined
CAM reconciliation in minutes, not months. Avoid costly errors with AI reviews.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/679f1fa714fa7564d296c1ff/67a11afcf7f4e86d97b8351b_2025_budget.png)
#### Intelligent budgeting
Our AI analyzes patterns in past years to expose trends in property expenses.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/679f1fa714fa7564d296c1ff/67a11c7164fc9fb913c9bd66_NNN_Reconciliation.png)
#### Effortless CAM reconciliation
Produce accurate CAM reconciliations with bulletproof audit reporting in a tenth of the time.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/679f1fa714fa7564d296c1ff/67a104e237de4f0c62e2b898_Screenshot%202025-02-03%20at%2010.02.54 AM.png)
#### More accurate forecasting
Visualize property data in real-time to understand and create NOI estimates, occupancy projections, and more.
## Accurate abstracts in minutes. Always up to date.
TripleZip uses AI to accelerate lease abstraction to minutes. Work confidently knowing that the latest amendments and notices have been imported automatically. 
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/679f1fa714fa7564d296c1ff/679f1fa714fa7564d296c9bb_check.svg)
Instant onboarding of leases and expenses
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/679f1fa714fa7564d296c1ff/679f1fa714fa7564d296c9bb_check.svg)
Automatic updates from amendments and notices
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/679f1fa714fa7564d296c1ff/679f1fa714fa7564d296c9bb_check.svg)
Prevent errors caused by manual entry
[Contact Us](https://www.triplezip.ai/</contact>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/679f1fa714fa7564d296c1ff/67a1135079465fe3b8b6d4e8_lease_abstract.png)
## Frequently Asked Questions
Discover why TripleZip is the future for scaling your property management capablities.
What is TripleZip and how can it help my team?
TripleZip is a SaaS platform designed to help property managers scale their operations efficiently. It offers features like automatic CAM reconciliation, AI lease and expense tracking, powerful budgeting and projections, and more. TripleZip enables lean teams to manage outsized portfolios of commercial properties.
Can I try TripleZip before committing to a plan?
Absolutely. We will work with you and your team to understand your needs, walk you through TripleZip, and are available by live phone and Zoom support to handle any use-case. You aren't committed to any plan until you are confident that TripleZip is right for you.
How does the lease onboarding process work?
After your upload your leases to TripleZip, you're done! We handle lease abstracting the process from there. You'll typically recieve access to your live platform within the same day.
Can I export and review data from TripleZip?
Yes. All reconciliaitons, reports, projections, and budgets are exportable as Excel files if you wish to review them.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/679f1fa714fa7564d296c1ff/67a00a516fc515e0da31a051_three-vertical-lines-svgrepo-com%20\(3\).png)
# Unlock your team's true value.
[Contact Us](https://www.triplezip.ai/</contact>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/679f1fa714fa7564d296c1ff/679f1fa714fa7564d296c99d_shape-1.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/679f1fa714fa7564d296c1ff/679f1fa714fa7564d296c99c_shape-2.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/679f1fa714fa7564d296c1ff/679f1fa714fa7564d296c99d_shape-1.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/679f1fa714fa7564d296c1ff/679f1fa714fa7564d296c99c_shape-2.svg)
¬© 2025 TripleZip, Inc. All rights reserved.

generated_description:
**Company Overview: TripleZip**

Founded in 2025 and part of Y Combinator‚Äôs W25 Batch, TripleZip is a New York-based startup focused on revolutionizing accounting for commercial real estate (CRE) through the power of AI. The company's mission is clear: **Automating CRE accounting with AI**. 

**What Does TripleZip Do?**

TripleZip provides a sleek SaaS platform that offers substantial cost savings‚Äîup to 95%‚Äîover traditional accounting firms, especially for complex tasks like Common Area Maintenance (CAM) reconciliation and budgeting. The automation capabilities of their platform enable CRE firms to manage their finances with much greater efficiency, executing processes up to ten times faster than before.

Here are some of the standout features:

- **Intelligent Budgeting & Forecasting**: The platform analyzes historical data to highlight trends in property expenses, allowing users to create budgets and forecasts with a level of insights that was previously time-prohibitive.
- **Effortless CAM Reconciliation**: With AI-driven reviews, users can complete CAM reconciliations in mere minutes, mitigating costly errors.
- **Accurate Lease Abstraction**: TripleZip accelerates lease abstracting, automatically incorporating the latest amendments, ensuring everything is current and reducing manual data entry risks.

**The Team Behind TripleZip**

Despite its small team of two, TripleZip‚Äôs impact is profound. With Harj Taggar as a Group Partner, the ethos is clearly about agility and innovation. The company's small size fosters a nimble environment, enabling rapid development and responsive adjustments to client needs.

**Why It Matters**

Commercial real estate has long been bogged down by cumbersome and traditional accounting practices. By integrating AI into this space, TripleZip not only streamlines operations but also helps firms focus on what truly matters: managing their properties effectively. It empowers lean teams to oversee larger portfolios and makes financial insights more accessible and actionable.

Whether you're in need of detailed forecasting or quick lease management, TripleZip positions itself as a critical partner in the CRE landscape, making the future of property accounting not just automated but intelligently insightful.

For more detailed insights, you can visit their website at [TripleZip.ai](https://www.triplezip.ai/).
